Stabilizing Shelves,
Stabilizing Society.

We believe that a stable home is the foundation of a stable city. Our core thesis posits a direct correlation between domestic object permanence and broader civic tranquility. Through a multi-pronged approach involving advanced feline behavioral analysis, aquatic-led policy making, and reinforced shelving infrastructure, FAUSI is pioneering a new era of urban harmony.

Our pilot programs in District 4 have demonstrated a 47% reduction in Unforeseen Gravity Events (UGEs) and a 62% increase in mayoral candidate approval among non-sentient decorative gourds.

This is more than a campaign; it's a movement. A movement towards a future where coffee cups remain where they are placed, where goldfish are given the legislative authority they deserve, and where society can finally address the larger issues, free from the distraction of crashing pottery.
